Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires the installation and maintenance of outdoor lithium-ion battery charging stations at multiple dwellings
Summary: Requires the installation and maintenance of outdoor lithium-ion battery charging stations at multiple dwellings as part of the state uniform fire prevention and building code; prohibits charging lithium-ion batteries used in powered mobility devices inside of multiple dwellings.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring the installation and maintenance of outdoor lithium-ion battery charging stations at multiple dwellings
